articles.title: Covid-19: Covax strikes deal with J&J for vaccine supply - News24
articles.description: Covax, the Covid-19 vaccine acquisition alliance, on which most African countries are reliant, has struck a deal with Johnson & Johnson.
articles.content:
• The deal is expected to benefit Africa's slow Covid-19 vaccine rollout.
  • The Serum Institute of India said it will not be exporting any more vaccine doses until the end of the year.
